comments.raw_text:
STR:

1. Update to ead2b17ac3cc.
2. Do a clobber build.
3. Update to a95d42642281.
4. Do make -f client.mk build

automation.py won't get updated to pick up the version change.  So if you use it (for example, like this: make -C objdir mochitest-browser-chrome), you'll get this error:

Error: Platform version '6.0a1' is not compatible with
minVersion >= 2.2a1pre
maxVersion <= 2.2a1pre

Also, MinefieldDebug.app is not deleted from objdir/dist when NightlyDebug.app is created, but that's a different issue, I guess.

comments.author: ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: I believe this can be fixed by adding $(GLOBAL_DEPS) to http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/build/automation-build.mk#59
comments.creator: benjamin@smedbergs.us
